title: Commending Outgoing Chief Carl Schreiner upon the occasion of his designation for special recognition after many years of dedicated service to the South Farmingdale Fire District
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE RESOLUTION commending Outgoing Chief Carl Schreiner upon the
occasion  of his designation for special recognition after many years of
dedicated service to the South Farmingdale Fire District

WHEREAS, The firefighters of New York State are renowned throughout  the
Nation;  their  reputation  is synonymous with excellence in the arduous
field of fire protection and prevention; and
  WHEREAS, Since the early days  of  "teapot  steamers,"  the  volunteer
firefighter  has  been  the cornerstone of our great Nation's efforts to
spare us from the ravages of fire; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its  long-
standing  traditions,  this  Legislative Body is justly proud to commend
Outgoing Chief Carl Schreiner upon the occasion of his  designation  for
special  recognition  after many years of dedicated service to the South
Farmingdale Fire District; this auspicious occasion will  be  celebrated
at  the Fire District's Annual Installation Dinner, to be held on Satur-
day, February 12, 2011, at The North Ritz Club,  274  Jericho  Turnpike,
Syosset, New York; and
  WHEREAS,  Volunteer firefighters and fire departments not only provide
the critical service of fire protection but also engage in other  activ-
ities of great benefit and importance to the communities they serve; and
  WHEREAS, It takes a special dedication, a strong desire to help others
and  a  tireless sense of community to forsake precious time with family
and friends to respond to the signal that a neighbor is in need;  Outgo-
ing  Chief  Carl  Schreiner  is  such a firefighter; throughout his many
years of devoted service, this volunteer heroically performed, above and
beyond the call of duty, those responsibilities which define the task of
fire protection; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
commend  Outgoing  Chief  Carl Schreiner upon the occasion of his desig-
nation for special recognition after many years of dedicated service  to
the South Farmingdale Fire District; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Outgoing Chief Carl Schreiner.
